title: Quick question about claiming my icon from Merch Store
body:
After my purchase I got this cute Rengar Plush icon and it says to this how to claim it.
 "Look up the Summoner Name of the account for which you wish to unlock this digital content."
My question is when it refers to summoner name do I enter my ign or the name I use to log into client? I don't want to send it to wrong account.

replies.body: That'll be the name that shows up when you're in-game and the one you see on this boards profile: C9SenpaiSimba ^_^
Thank you very much for the help <3{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
